mapper.sql: id, schoolName, schoolEnglishName, continentCode, countryCode, stateCode, cityCode, schoolTypeCode, schoolGenderTypeCode, religionTypeCode, mainPicture, positionX, positionY, hasEsl
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from school
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into school (id, schoolName, schoolEnglishName, continentCode, countryCode, stateCode, cityCode, schoolTypeCode, schoolGenderTypeCode, religionTypeCode, mainPicture, positionX, positionY, hasEsl) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{continentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolGenderTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{religionTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionX,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{positionY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hasEsl,jdbcType=BIT})

id,
schoolName,

continentCode,

religionTypeCode,

mapper.update:
update school
schoolName = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schoolEnglishName = #{schoolEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
continentCode = #{continentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
countryCode = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stateCode = #{stateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

positionY = #{positionY,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
hasEsl = #{hasEsl,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update school set schoolName = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schoolEnglishName = #{schoolEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, continentCode = #{continentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, countryCode = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stateCode = #{stateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityCode = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schoolTypeCode = #{schoolTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schoolGenderTypeCode = #{schoolGenderTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, religionTypeCode = #{religionTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mainPicture = #{mainPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, positionX = #{positionX,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, positionY = #{positionY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hasEsl = #{hasEsl,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
